create_chatbot.description: Create and train a chatbot using custom data, medical models, or custom models. Training takes 1-2 minutes.

props.name: chatbotName
props.description: The name of the chatbot to be created

props.name: model
props.description: Select the chatbot model. Note: sourceText and urlsToScrape are ignored for medical and custom models.

props.name: sourceText
props.description: Training text for the chatbot. Character limits apply based on your plan. Only used for custom-data-upload model.

props.name: urlsToScrape
props.description: URLs to extract content from. Must start with http:// or https:// (only for custom-data-upload model)

props.name: url
props.description: Website URL starting with http:// or https://

props.name: products
props.description: List of products for training the chatbot

props.name: id
props.description: Unique ID for tracking the product in the knowledge base

props.name: information
props.description: Structured data of the product in key-value format (1-2 levels deep recommended)

props.name: qAndAs
props.description: List of questions and answers for the chatbot to learn

props.name: question
props.description: The question on a specific topic

props.name: answer
props.description: The answer to the question

props.name: customBackend
props.description: URL of a custom backend for the chatbot

props.name: bearer
props.description: Authentication bearer token for custom backend

delete_chatbot.description: Delete a chatbot and all its associated data (training data, conversations, leads, etc.). This action is irreversible.

props.name: chatbotId
props.description: Select the chatbot to delete

retrain_chatbot.description: Retrain an existing chatbot with new data or remove existing data (custom-data-upload model only)

props.name: chatbotId
props.description: Select the chatbot to retrain

props.name: sourceText
props.description: New text data for training the chatbot

props.name: urlsToScrape
props.description: List of URLs to extract content from (existing URLs will be recrawled)

props.name: url
props.description: Website URL starting with http:// or https://

props.name: cookies
props.description: Cookies for authorization (semicolon-separated: "cookie1=value1; cookie2=value2")

props.name: extractMainContent
props.description: Automatically remove headers, footers, nav, sidebar, and ads

props.name: includeOnlyTags
props.description: CSS selectors to exclusively extract (comma-separated)

props.name: excludeTags
props.description: CSS selectors to exclude from scraping (comma-separated)

props.name: products
props.description: List of products for training (existing products with same ID will be overwritten)

props.name: id
props.description: Unique ID for tracking the product

props.name: information
props.description: Structured product data in key-value format

props.name: qAndAs
props.description: List of questions and answers for the chatbot to learn

props.name: question
props.description: The question on a specific topic

props.name: answer
props.description: The answer to the question

props.name: deletes
props.description: List of knowledge sources to remove from the chatbot

props.name: type
props.description: The type of knowledge chunk to delete

props.name: url
props.description: The URL to delete (required if type is website)

send_message.description: Send messages to a chatbot and receive a response with support for streaming and OpenAI-compatible formats

props.name: chatbotId
props.description: Select the chatbot to send message to

props.name: messageContent
props.description: The text content of the message to send

props.name: messageRole
props.description: The role of the message sender

props.name: conversationId
props.description: Select an existing conversation or leave empty to start a new one

props.name: includeReasoning
props.description: Include reasoning in the response (overrides chatbot settings)

props.name: baseModel
props.description: Override the chatbot's base model for this request

props.name: basePrompt
props.description: Override the chatbot's base prompt for this request

props.name: openAIFormat
props.description: Return response in OpenAI-compatible format

props.name: appendMessages
props.description: Append this message to previous messages with the same conversationId

props.name: attachedFiles
props.description: Files to attach to the message (max 3 files)

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the attached file

props.name: type
props.description: The MIME type of the file

props.name: url
props.description: Publicly accessible URL where the file is hosted

props.name: content
props.description: Pre-parsed textual content. If provided, file won\

update_chatbot_settings.description: Update comprehensive settings for a chatbot including name, prompts, behavior, and appearance

props.name: chatbotId
props.description: Select the chatbot to update

props.name: chatbotName
props.description: Update the name of the chatbot

props.name: basePrompt
props.description: Update the base prompt for the chatbot

props.name: initialMessages
props.description: Array of initial messages to be used by the chatbot

props.name: message
props.description: Initial message text

props.name: suggestedMessages
props.description: Array of suggested messages shown in the chatbot

props.name: message
props.description: Suggested message text

props.name: visibility
props.description: Control whether your chatbot is accessible to others

props.name: baseModel
props.description: The AI model used in the RAG processing pipeline

props.name: temperature
props.description: AI model temperature (0-1, controls randomness)

props.name: storeChat
props.description: Whether chat history will be stored on the server

props.name: trackIpAddress
props.description: Whether IP addresses will be stored for conversations and leads

props.name: rateLimitPoints
props.description: Maximum number of messages per timeframe from one device

props.name: rateLimitTimeframe
props.description: Timeframe in seconds for rate limiting

props.name: rateLimitMessage
props.description: Error message shown when rate limited

props.name: onlyAllowOnAddedDomains
props.description: Only allow the iframe and widget on specific domains

props.name: domains
props.description: Array of domains where the chatbot is allowed

props.name: domain
props.description: Domain URL (e.g., example.com)

props.name: showCalendar
props.description: Display Calendly booking button in the chatbot

props.name: calendarUrl
props.description: Calendly URL for appointment scheduling

props.name: calendarMessage
props.description: Message to display for appointment scheduling

props.name: enableBouncingAnimation
props.description: Whether the chatbot bubble should bounce to attract attention

props.name: ignoreDataSource
props.description: Ignore custom data and act like pure ChatGPT

props.name: customBackend
props.description: URL of a custom backend for the chatbot

props.name: bearer
props.description: Authentication token for custom backend

upload_file.description: Upload a file to be used with a chatbot for training or knowledge base

props.name: chatbotId
props.description: Select the chatbot to upload file to

props.name: file
props.description: The file to upload to the chatbot
